data.message: I don't like trump, but that freestyle was lame as fuck.  Maybe you should have drank some of that hot coffee first. You sound so salty must be dying of thirst Fucking stupid er imma stop shit so fake like an undercover cop.

replies.message: That's what I'm saying I don't like trump either and that shit was wack!
You can't unite people and divide them at the same time.  Government is an illusion not a person
Did u not hear it correctly? Put on your hearing aids

Im not that old lol i produce music and am pretty sure my ears are fine.  I really don't mean to hate on em that guy has made me laugh my ass off so many times with his words. I know freestyle is a talent and he is super talented.  But compared to what people expect from the "Rap God" it was lame.  Come on admit it.  And he's Orange.  Wow mind blown
You memorized the lines? It must have been lame you cuckservative snowflake, find your safe space
Let's see... zero other artists even said a word. So.. he's still number 1.
He said "imma stop" deliberately because his next line presumeably about Melania or.ivanka would get censored. Rhymes also with "prop" on his next line.
Lol go listen to pop music.   It's mastered by your government and made by disney
This is eminem dude he can go off if he wanted to he wasnt trying to hard wasnt even rap he was just talking
